meanings.sent1: The jargoneers in the meeting confused everyone with their technical words.
meanings.sent2: The new employee quickly became one of the jargoneers in the IT department.
meanings.sent3: The jargoneers at the conference had everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: She was a true jargoneer, weaving complex terms effortlessly into her speech.
meanings.sent5: The jargoneers were like walking dictionaries of industry terms.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in using technical or specialized language.
meanings.sent1: The jargoneers at the tech company were experts in their field.
meanings.sent2: As a jargoneer, he could explain complex concepts in simple terms.
meanings.sent3: The jargoneers made the presentation sound like a foreign language class.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the jargoneer queen, mastering every technical term.
meanings.sent5: The jargoneers were like wizards casting spells with their words.

meanings.definition: Individuals who communicate using industry-specific terminology.
meanings.sent1: The jargoneers in the marketing team always spoke in advertising terms.
meanings.sent2: He became a jargoneer after years of working in the aerospace industry.
meanings.sent3: The jargoneers turned the office into a language lab with their discussions.
meanings.sent4: She was the ultimate jargoneer, translating complex terms for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The jargoneers were like secret agents with their coded language.
